name: nextcloud-social
tagline: A federated social app built into Nextcloud
description: Nextcloud Social is a federated social media app using ActivityPub. It enables posts, follows, and interaction with other platforms like Mastodonâ€”all within the Nextcloud infrastructure.

features.title: Activitypub Federation
features.description: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other federated social networks

features.title: Post Creation
features.description: Share text, images, and links with followers on your timeline

features.title: Follow System
features.description: Follow users on your instance or across the fediverse for content discovery

features.title: Timeline Feeds
features.description: View posts from followed users in chronological or filtered timelines

features.title: Interactions
features.description: Like, boost, and reply to posts from your instance or federated networks

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set post visibility as public, followers-only, or direct messages

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tag posts with hashtags for discoverability and topic organization

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts for mentions, follows, and interactions with your posts
